item.title: A $HOME on the internet
item.author: faresa.bakhit@gmail.com (Fares A. Bakhit)
item.description:
Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools speak because they have to say something.

— Plato

After the many hours I spent reading Hacker News, surfing the internet, looking for answers, and starving to read others experiences and stories, I feel that I have something to say, but do I really? Am I a fool?
